strapiPost.title: 2022 NWA Spring Job Fair Today
strapiPost.content:
The Rogers-Lowell Area Chamber of Commerce is hosting its 2022 Northwest Arkansas Spring Job Fair today, and there are nearly 100 employers registered to attend. 

  • Community strengthening: Those working in economic development say the Job Fairs provide opportunities for workforce strengthening in NWA, and they are a key factor in increasing the quality of life in the region. The Chamber's Northwest Arkansas Job Fairs are the longest-running job fairs in Arkansas and are free to job seekers. 
  • Pathways: Despite low unemployment numbers, there are ‘now hiring’ signs around, and job fairs are still viable career pathways for job seekers. The NWA Spring Job Fair today is at the Frisco Station Mall, located at 100 N. Dixieland Rd in Rogers, and will go from 10-3p. 

Learn more HERE.
